goals.description: Create unified cross-language test runner that can execute tests across all language SDKs
goals.success_criteria: Test runner can execute unit, integration, and end-to-end tests across Python, Rust, JavaScript, Ruby, C#, Go, PHP, Java, and Bash with unified reporting

goals.description: Implement cross-language test data sharing and fixture management system
goals.success_criteria: Test data can be shared between languages, fixtures are automatically managed, and test state is synchronized across language boundaries

goals.description: Build multi-language test result aggregation and reporting system
goals.success_criteria: Comprehensive test reports with cross-language coverage analysis, performance metrics, and failure correlation across languages
